sentences.english: The finless porpoise prefer to live in shallow, warm waters like those of theYangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 江豚喜欢生活在长江这种较为温暖，黑暗的水中。

sentences.english: The finless porpoise is an icon of an ecosystem under siege.
sentences.chinese: 长江江豚的灭亡将会是生态系统遭受破坏的一个标志。

sentences.english: The baiji dolphin, the ancient river sturgeon and the finless porpoise depend on the Yangtze fortheir survival.
sentences.chinese: 白鳍豚，古老的鲟鱼和江豚都生活在长江中。

sentences.english: Pressure on the finless porpoise population on Poyang Lake comes from the high numbers of ships passing through and sand dredging.
sentences.chinese: 压力对江豚人口鄱阳湖来自大量的船只通过，沙疏浚。

definition: see 白鱀豚|白𬶨豚[bai2 ji4 tun2]

(bird species of China) scaly-sided merganser (Mergus squamatus)
(bird species of China) Baer's pochard (Aythya baeri)
(bird species of China) oriental stork (Ciconia boyciana)
Yangtze giant soft-shell turtle (Rafetus swinhoei), a critically endangered species
(bird species of China) black-faced spoonbill (Platalea minor)
